Package de.linearbits.preferences

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PreferenceBoolean
    A preference for boolean variables
    PreferenceCharacter
    A preference for char variables
    PreferenceDouble
    A preference for double variables
    PreferenceInteger
    A preference for integer variables
    PreferencesDialog
    This class implements the preferences dialog
    PreferencesDialogConfiguration
    This class provides basic configuration options for the dialog
    PreferenceSelection
    A preference for set-valued variables
    PreferenceString
    A preference for string variables (single line)
    PreferenceText
    A preference for textual variables (multi-line)
    Resources
    This class provides access to basic resources.
